comment.author: Mackenzie
comment.text: Trump kicked her butt and it is still rolling down hill. And he was fighting with his arm tied behind his back, taking on 3 at once and still manage to hit Bill Clinton between the eyes. On the Trump Train and moving on down the line.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Interesting since Bill is not running.

replies.author: Mackenzie
replies.text: And he still got hit by 4 lovely women and called out by Trump.
